prompts: Create an ethereal Pokemon that embodies the cosmos with starry eyes and a floating shape.
I want a mystical creature with swirling blue clouds and a dark, starry body that captivates trainers.
Generate a tiny Pokemon that represents the universe, featuring vibrant colors and a celestial theme.
Make a legendary Pokemon that resembles a nebula, with a blend of dark and bright colors.
Imagine a cute, cosmic Pokemon with cloud-like features and a star-shaped accent that glows.
Design a whimsical Pokemon that floats gracefully, surrounded by magical, colorful orbs.
Show me a Pokemon that captures the beauty of space, with a unique shape and dreamy colors.

distinctive_features: Dark central body with bright accents
